unnormalised: Hey guys, interesting discussion! Back in Kerala, during Onam, my grandmom always worried about the pesticide use on the rice fields. Remember Prof. Swaminathan's research? Seems like excessive spraying is still a problem, even with new tech. Heard some farmers near Coimbatore are trying organic methods. Hope it works out! Too much pesticide ruins the biryani's flavour, you know? Rs. 5000 down the drain if the rice is bad!
